Detailed Description

CLocalOperation: Simple transformation involving two different image classes, last updated 4/8/2001.

This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Version:
0.90
Author:

Member Function Documentation

bool ipl::CLocalOperation::DrawHistogram (  CStdImage &    Source,
CStdImage &    Dest
) 
 

calculates the histogram of the image Source and draws it in Dest.

The Dest image has dimensions (w,h,bits)=(277,300,1). If Source has 24 b/p the procedure calculates the histogram of the corresponding gray-tone image. The history of Source is copied to Dest, old history in Dest is deleted.

Parameters:
Source  is the source image
Dest  is the destination image
Returns :
False if the source image is empty, Source is the same image as Dest or has less than 8 b/p
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 33 of file local_operation.cpp.

References ipl::CText::AppendIPL(), ipl::CStdImage::GetTImagePtr(), ipl::CStdImage::m_History, TString::pChars, and ipl::CText::RemoveLastLine().

bool ipl::CLocalOperation::EqualizeHistogram (  CStdImage &    Source,
CStdImage &    Dest
) 
 

transforms Source into Dest using a local pixel value transformation so that the histogram become equalized.

If Source has 24 b/p the procedure calculates the histogram of the corresponding gray-tone image, and the LUT derived from this is applied so that all three rgb-intensities are scaled by the factor (LUT[p]/p) where p is the average of the three intensities.

Parameters:
Source  is a pointer to the source image
Dest  is the pointer to the destination image
Returns :
False if the source image is empty or has less than 8 b/p.
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 61 of file local_operation.cpp.

References ipl::CText::AppendIPL(), ipl::CStdImage::GetTImagePtr(), ipl::CStdImage::m_History, TString::pChars, and ipl::CText::RemoveLastLine().

bool ipl::CLocalOperation::NonlinearCopyToByte (  CComplexImage &    Source,
COMPLEXCHOISE    mode,
float    gamma,
float    Min,
float    Max,
CStdImage &    Dest
) 
 

copies a CFloatImage into a CImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation: If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255.

Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output= INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = INT(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma)).

Parameters:
Source  is the source image
mode  Determines what part of the complex image is to be copied. The values are COMPLEX_REAL, COMPLEX_IMAGINARY, or COMPLEX_MODULUS.
gamma  is the power in the conversion function (logaritmic conversion if gamma ==0)
Min  is the value in Source giving gray tone 0 in Dest
Max  is the value in Source giving gray tone 255 in Dest
Dest  is the destimation image
Returns :
False, if the source image is empty or if Min>=Max
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implementation by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 177 of file local_operation.cpp.

bool ipl::CLocalOperation::NonlinearCopyToByte (  CIntImage &    Source,
float    gamma,
int    Min,
int    Max,
CStdImage &    Dest
) 
 

copies a CIntImage into a CImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation: If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255.

Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output= INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = INT(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma)).

Parameters:
Source  is the source image
gamma  is the power in the conversion function (logaritmic conversion if gamma ==0)
Min  is the value in Source giving gray tone 0 in Dest
Max  is the value in Source giving gray tone 255 in Dest
Dest  is the destimation image
Returns :
False, if the source image is empty or if Min>=Max

Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output= INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = INT(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma)).

bool ipl::CLocalOperation::NonlinearCopyToByte (  CStdImage &    Source,
float    gamma,
int    Min,
int    Max,
CStdImage &    Dest
) 
 

copies an object of class CImage or CByteImage into a CImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation.

Source Image must have 8 b/p. If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255. Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output=INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = INT(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma)).

Parameters:
Source  is the source image
gamma  is the power in the conversion function (logaritmic conversion if gamma ==0)
Min  is the value in Source giving gray tone 0 in Dest
Max  is the value in Source giving gray tone 255 in Dest
Dest  is the destimation image
Returns :
False, if the source image is empty or does not have 8b/p or if Min>=Max
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implementation by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)
